The application stack is organized in categories along the left side of the home screen
* Favorites
* Accessories
* Games
* Graphics
* Internet
* Office
* Sound & Video
* Preferences
* Administration

Access to various areas of the users filesystem is provided by the icons along the right side of the home screen
* Home
* Network
* Music
* Documents
* Pictures
* Videos
* Quit

When the favorites category is selected
* Remove favorite

The panel allows access to all running applications and system status applets
* Opening multiple applications shows each as a tab in panel
* Clicking the circle of friends brings user back to home screen
* Battery/Power Management applet is available in Panel
* Network Manager is available on Panel
* Bluetooth Manager is available on Panel
* Sound device management is available on Panel
* World Clock is available on Panel

The user is provided visual feedback for the following actions
* Mouse over
** Category - Highlight Name
** Application Icon - Highlight Name + Zoom Icon
** File System Icon - Highlight Name
** Quit - Highlight Name
* Single Click
** Category - Opens Category
** Application Icon - Icon Spins, App launched
** File System Icon - Folder is opened
** Quit - Logout menu shown
* Right Click
** Application Icons - Opens menu, Execute|Add to Favorites
